title: Lifetime-Sorority Surrogate [2014]
description:
Lifetime-Sorority Surrogate (2014) 

Air Date: 22 Mar 2014

Summary: College student Valerie, 21, agrees to be a surrogate mother. But when the biological parents die tragically, the "grandmother" Madeline becomes more and more controlling of Valerie and the unborn child until Valerie realizes her life is in danger. She flees desperate to protect herself and the child, using a network of sorority sisters for support.

Cast: 

Cassie Steele ... Valerie Vont 
 
Mimi Kuzyk ... Maureen Darlington 
 
Chris Bruno ... Charlie Harding 
 
Daniel Kelly ... Kyle 
 
Elena Juatco ... Su 
 
Matthew Bennett ... Walter 
 
Siobhan Murphy ... Sara

Megan Hutchings ... Jackie 
 
Ron Lea ... Oscar Oberly 
 
Thom Vernon ... Cristian Vont 
 
Allana Harkin ... Dr. Vernon
